articles.description: NASA’s Astronomy Picture of the Day is a fascinating snapshot of the dark nebulae and the star formation in the Taurus Molecular Cloud (TMC).
articles.content: When gas, dust and plasma get accumulated in space, it usually leads to the formation of interstellar clouds. Initially, these clouds are hot in nature but when they become dense and cool enough, mol… [+1879 chars]

articles.author: Ethan Siegel
articles.title: Runaway supermassive black hole caught by Hubble - Big Think
articles.description: Speeding through the Universe and leaving a wake of new stars, this runaway supermassive black hole is likely the first among thousands.
